author: gartung
body:
Utilities/StaticAnalyzer: Add TFileServer:: functions to list of known thread unsafe functions.
    Update statics.py to only report non-const static access for non edm::one and edm::global modules.
    Update statics.py to report calls to TFileServer functions from non edm::one and edm::global modules

Tested locally.
title: Utilities/StaticAnalyzer: Add TFileServer:: functions to list of known thread unsafe functions.
